changeSet.sql: CREATE VIEW "vw_document" AS SELECT d.id AS "id", d.created_at AS "created_at", d.updated_at AS "updated_at", d.user_id AS "user_id", d.type AS "type", d.storage_key AS "storage_key", d.status AS "status", d.reject_reason AS "reject_reason", p.name AS "profile_name", u.email AS "user_email", k.status AS "kyc_status" FROM "tb_document" d JOIN "tb_user" u ON u.id = d.user_id JOIN "tb_profile" p ON p.user_id = u.id LEFT JOIN "tb_kyc" k ON k.user_id = u.id;
